name: Memory (itch) (Hallwayy)
description:
(click on the dot to start - tw descriptions of trauma)

This is a game I made in 3 hours for the Trijam (3 hour game jam). I'm really glad I took part. I got the sounds from this freesound pack by jalastram. The game is about the natural process of memories and trauma. So tw fairly abstract descriptions of effects of trauma. It takes less than 5 minutes to play through I think.
